text: Edward Charles John "Eddie" Litzenberger (born July 15, 1932 in Neudorf, Saskatchewan: died November 1, 2010) was a Canadian professional ice hockey right winger. He played for the Chicago Black Hawks, Montreal Canadiens, Detroit Red Wings and Toronto Maple Leafs of the National Hockey League (NHL). Litzenberger won the Stanley Cup four times - onc with the Chicago Black Hawks, in 1961, and three times with the Toronto Maple Leafs, in 1962, 1963, and 1964. ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Calder Trophy winners Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Ice hockey people from Saskatchewan Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players Category:Regina Pats players Category:Stanley Cup champions
title: Ed Litzenberger
